thread.title: 19 Pictures That Prove There Was Nothing Better Than Staying Home Sick As A Kid
thread.title_full: 19 Pictures That Prove There Was Nothing Better Than Staying Home Sick As A Kid

author: Dave Stopera
title: 19 Pictures That Prove There Was Nothing Better Than Staying Home Sick As A Kid
text:
View this image ›
CBS ID: 10395907 2. Eating soup… View this image ›
Twitter: @imlilging ID: 10397050 3. Drinking soda that’s supposed to help you feel better: View this image ›
walmart.com ID: 10396995 4. And shoving crackers into your mouth. View this image ›
icecream.wikia.com ID: 10397013 5. But nothing tasted better than that pink stuff: View this image ›
Twitter: @HydraHannah ID: 10396202 6. That sweet, sweet pink stuff. View this image ›
Twitter: @JayBigPoetry_ ID: 10398115 7. And don’t even get me started on the purple stuff: View this image ›
walgreens.com ID: 10395891 8. Or the orange stuff: View this image ›
Twitter: @ThatDancer ID: 10396978 9. Or the cure to all illnesses, Vick’s: View this image ›
Twitter: @hansolicc ID: 10398095 10. And nothing was better than turning on some trashy TV: View this image ›
Twitter: @SoDamnTrue ID: 10397184 11. Or watching a show that was literally about grocery shopping: View this image ›
ABC ID: 10390953 12. Seeing Judge Judy lay down the law: View this image ›
Twitter: @SoDamnTrue ID: 10397189 13. Or Judge Mathis tell it like it is: View this image ›
Twitter: @SoDamnTrue ID: 10397188 14. Or watching your stories: View this image ›
Twitter: @Shalbiyonce ID: 10397293 15. Or chanting JERRY! JERRY! over and over again: View this image ›
Twitter: @SoDamnTrue ID: 10397190 16. And maybe you’d go to the doctor eventually, but at least you had this waiting for you: View this image ›
inthe00s.com ID: 10397265 17. Or this toy that just seemed to materialize in doctor’s offices: View this image ›
the-toy-palace.com ID: 10397261 18. And then the next day it was time to go back… View this image ›
reddit.com ID: 10398139 19. Unless you could pull off this Oscar winning performance: View this image ›
tumblr.com Got ‘em.
ID: 10397716
